rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0001
rows.name: Now, I assume you can give us the details?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0002
rows.name: Yeah[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0003
rows.name:
The Lifepoint coordinates were calculated based on information from
Data Probes and the trajectory elements from the White Whale's crash,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0004
rows.name: Frontier Net analyzed this to determine the approximate location.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0005
rows.name: You all know that much, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0006
rows.name: The number of Data Probes has increased, and the analysis accuracy has gone up significantly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0007
rows.name: And so, finally, the main prize[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0008
rows.name:
That is to say, we've found the coordinates
of the Lifepoint's core: the Central Life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0009
rows.name: Whaaat!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0010
rows.name: Momo!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0011
rows.name: Is that true?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0012
rows.name: Yeah, there's almost no doubt about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0013
rows.name: Lin-san, you did it-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0014
rows.name: Yeah! Then, we have to hurry![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0015
rows.name: But[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_JNK0010
rows.name: Speculate

rows.label: xs11030100_SEL0011
rows.name: Bring up Lao's name.

rows.label: xs11030100_JNK0020
rows.name: Observe

rows.label: xs11030100_SEL0021
rows.name: Wait silently for him to continue.

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0016
rows.name: Why Lao-san?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0017
rows.name: That's what this is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0018
rows.name: Could it be... it was already broken or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0019
rows.name: If that were the case, we would have ceased functioning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0020
rows.name: Ah, right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0021
rows.name: Lao[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0021_2
rows.name: That's what this is about, isn't it, Vandham?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0022
rows.name: Yeah. He took the [System:Ruby rt=device ]terminal[/System:Ruby] that was in the middle of analysis. And he politely deleted the backups too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_JNK0030
rows.name: Regret

rows.label: xs11030100_SEL0031
rows.name: Regret that you should have shot Lao.

rows.label: xs11030100_JNK0040
rows.name: Question

rows.label: xs11030100_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask if the analysis can be redone.

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0024
rows.name: That judgment wasn't wrong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0025
rows.name:
We didn't know where on his body Lao
was hiding the [System:Ruby rt=device ]terminal[/System:Ruby].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0026
rows.name:
If we had accidentally shot it, the analysis
would have to be redone from scratch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0027
rows.name: But in that case, we wouldn't make it in time for the operation limit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0028
rows.name: Exactly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0029
rows.name: Of course, we've already started.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0030
rows.name:
But those coordinate data were derived from
a massive amount of accumulated data.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0031
rows.name:
If we take the time, we could probably
get the same result. However[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0032
rows.name:
The operation time limit will run out before
the analysis results come in, won't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0033
rows.name: Yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0034
rows.name: There is only one path.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0035
rows.name: Find Lao-san and get the data [System:Ruby rt=device ]terminal[/System:Ruby] back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0036
rows.name:
He likely headed to the Growth stronghold,
which is said to be in the north of Shiraki no Tairiku.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0037
rows.name: We'll chase him immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0038
rows.name: That place the alien Ga-Derg mentioned, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0039
rows.name: I know I'm always relying on you, but I'm counting on you for this one too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11030100_MSG0040
rows.name: Lao, that bastard... what the hell is he trying to do?[ST:wait ]
